pageProduct.name: Avene Cicalfate+ Anti Scarring Marks Gel 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). DIMETHICONE. GLYCERIN. HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYDIMETHYL. TAURATE COPOLYMER. DIMETHICONOL. AQUAPHILUS DOLOMIAE FERMENT FILTRATE. ARGININE. COPPER SUFATE. DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER. POLYSORBATE 60. SODIUM BENZOATE. SODIUM HYALURONATE. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. TROMETHAMINE. WATER (AQUA). XANTHAN GUM. ZINC SULFATE.

Directions

Once the scar is closed, apply twice a day with massage for up to 6 months.
Scar massage increases scar mobility to promote healing, soften the tissue and reduce the risk of scar hypotrophy.
